name: Jackfruit Vegan Pozole Rojo
description: Vegan Jackfruit Pozole Rojo, a spicy soup made with dried chiles, hominy, jackfruit, and veggies.

video.name: Jackfruit Vegan Pozole Rojo
video.description: Jackfruit Vegan Pozole Rojo, a traditional pozole made with jackfruit.

recipeIngredient: 5  Chile de árbol, dried, (stemmed and seeded)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, combine the vegetable stock and hominy and bring to a LOW simmer.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot, combine the vegetable stock and hominy and bring to a LOW simmer.

recipeInstructions.text: While the hominy is simmering, remove stems and seeds from the chile ancho, arbol, and guajillo. Rinse and place in a medium pot with water.
recipeInstructions.name: While the hominy is simmering, remove stems and seeds from the chile ancho, arbol, and guajillo. Rinse and place in a medium pot with water.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring pot to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring pot to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain chiles, but reserve 1 ½ cups of the chile water. Place chiles, garlic and onion in the blender, add the chile water and blend until smooth. Strain.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain chiles, but reserve 1 ½ cups of the chile water. Place chiles, garlic and onion in the blender, add the chile water and blend until smooth. Strain.

recipeInstructions.text: To prepare the jackfruit, drain the jackfruit, rinse, and pat with paper towels. Cut out the core of the jackfruit (tip of the triangle pieces), and cut pieces in half. Heat 1 tbsp. of oil in a large sauté pan set to medium heat. Add the jackfruit and cook for 3 -4 minutes on each side or until it begins to brown. Pour the chile sauce over the jackfruit and reduce heat to low-medium. Simmer for 10 minutes or until jackfruit begins to break down and the sauce has thickened slightly. Use a fork to shred the jackfruit as it cooks down. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: To prepare the jackfruit, drain the jackfruit, rinse, and pat with paper towels. Cut out the core of the jackfruit (tip of the triangle pieces), and cut pieces in half. Heat 1 tbsp. of oil in a large sauté pan set to medium heat. Add the jackfruit and cook for 3 -4 minutes on each side or until it begins to brown. Pour the chile sauce over the jackfruit and reduce heat to low-medium. Simmer for 10 minutes or until jackfruit begins to break down and the sauce has thickened slightly. Use a fork to shred the jackfruit as it cooks down. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Your hominy should still be simmering very slowly. Scoop out one cup of the hominy-vegetable stock mixture and blend until smooth. Pour this back into the pot with the hominy
recipeInstructions.name: Your hominy should still be simmering very slowly. Scoop out one cup of the hominy-vegetable stock mixture and blend until smooth. Pour this back into the pot with the hominy

recipeInstructions.text: Raise heat to medium-low, and add the zucchini and shredded jackfruit with sauce. Let simmer for 8- 10 minutes or until the zucchini is tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Raise heat to medium-low, and add the zucchini and shredded jackfruit with sauce. Let simmer for 8- 10 minutes or until the zucchini is tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve your pozole with all of the toppings on the side.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve your pozole with all of the toppings on the side.
